TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-P2-TNSSelect Request_Id Req_Id, User_Concurrent_Program_Name User_Concurrent_Program_Name, fcr.description orig_request_id, -- Fr.Responsibility_Name, Phase_Code, Status_Code , To_Char(Floor((Nvl(Actual_Completion_Date, Sysdate) - Actual_Start_Date)*24*60)) ||':' ||Lpad(To_Char(Round(Mod((Nvl(Actual_Completion_Date, Sysdate) - Actual_Start_Date)*24*60,1)*60,2)),2,'0') Min_Secs, argument1 , argument2 , argument3 , argument4 , argument5 , argument6 , argument7 , argument8 , argument9 , argument10, argument11, argument12, argument13, argument14, argument15, User_Name, Fu.Description, Request_Date , Actual_Start_Date, Actual_Completion_Date, Fcr.Concurrent_Program_Id, Fu.User_Id, Fr.Responsibility_Id, Fcr.Program_Application_Id, fa.application_short_name, Concurrent_Program_Name, Fe.Executable_Name, Fe.Execution_Method_Code, Fe.Execution_File_Name, -- get_link(fcr.request_id, 'o') outfile_link, -- get_link(fcr.request_id, 'l') logfile_link, Fcr.Oracle_Session_Id, Logfile_Name, Outfile_Name, Logfile_Node_Name, Outfile_Node_Name From Apps.Fnd_Concurrent_Requests Fcr, Apps.Fnd_Concurrent_Programs_Vl Fcp, Apps.Fnd_User Fu, Apps.Fnd_Responsibility_Vl Fr, Apps.Fnd_Executables Fe, apps.Fnd_application fa Where 1 = 1 And Fcr.Responsibility_Id = Fr.Responsibility_Id And Fu.User_Id = Fcr.Requested_By And Fcp.Application_Id = Fcr.Program_Application_Id And Fcp.Concurrent_Program_Id = Fcr.Concurrent_Program_Id And Fcp.Executable_Id = Fe.Executable_Id and fcr.Program_Application_Id = fa.application_id And Regexp_Like (User_Concurrent_Program_Name,'(HU Asset Workbench Detail Report)|HUFA Asset Inventory Report','i') and fcr.description is not null --And Regexp_Like (User_Name , '(80408838)|(999)', 'i') --and actual_start_date between to_date('12-feb-2017 20:00:00','dd-mon-yyyy hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('25-feb-2017 21:00:00','dd-mon-yyyy hh24:mi:ss') --and status_code != 'c' --and request_id in (7203118) --and parent_request_id in (6790792) --and request_id > 49253092 Order By Request_Id
